newsletter.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
newsletter.subtitle: The latest events, news, articles, and resources, sent to your inbox weekly.

term.text: By continuing on this site, you agree to be bound by our terms and conditions
term.name: Terms and Conditions

About.about_desc: We are a company focused on the dissemination of cultural events worldwide.
About.mision_desc: Allow to disseminate, promote and find cultural events through a single medium.
About.vision_desc: To be the main and distinctive digital medium for the diffusion and search of events
About.visualize: View according to your geographical area.
About.mark: Mark your events as I am interested or I will attend.
About.route: Trace the route to the event.

Advert.question: Do you want to advertise with us?
Advert.answer: We have the following advertising options
Advert.target_desc: Advertise your events on our website and mobile app by appearing in recommended events.
Advert.social_desc:
We offer you the possibility of creating a specialized campaign to publicize your event on social networks.

 We offer you to be advertised on our social networks with the creative support of our marketing team.
Advert.advert_desc:
Banners and Recommendations

 It appears in the different sections of the website and mobile application, this service can be contracted from the administrative panel as an event promoter.
Advert.newsletter_desc: Do you want to appear in our newsletter? We offer you a space for your company in our monthly newsletter.
Advert.ticket_desc: Advertise on our digital and physical tickets.

Donation.question: Do you want your foundation to receive any of our donations?
Donation.answer: Get in touch with us, we will send you the requirements to include in our donation program.
Donation.how_answer:
The promoter publishes and sells his tickets with us, the promoter proposes, chooses or allows us to choose a foundation from our list.

Once the net proceeds are obtained, we set aside 2% per ticket and donate it to the chosen foundation.

Newsletter.title: Subscribe to our mailing list
Newsletter.subtitle: Join our mailing list to stay up to date with cultural news and upcoming events.

Partners.question: Do you want to be part of our alliances or partners?
Partners.answer: Communicate through any means of contact and lets work together to take culture to another level.
Partners.resume: At Ctickets we have the best alliances and strategic partners, which allow us to bring you closer to culture and provide you with the best quality in all our services.

Ticket.header_subtitle: Promote, sell and manage tickets for your events.
Ticket.title: Your Event, Your Rules
Ticket.subtitle: Manage all your events in one place.
Ticket.monitor: Monitor the scope of your events through an administrative panel
Ticket.monitor_desc: Translate data into information, process the one that leads to higher profits and better marketing strategies.
Ticket.sell_desc: We offer the availability of ticket office with the lowest commission in the market.
Ticket.sell_list_3: If your even is free, our services are too
Ticket.marketing_desc: Reach millions of regular event attendees through our mobile app, website, social media, tickets, newsletter and blog.
Ticket.marketing_list_2: Dissemination at the local, state, national or international level
Ticket.design_desc: Our creative team is at your disposal for the creation and design of content to generate the best possible experience
Ticket.client_desc: We have your back with our customer service, we also take care of your customers doubts.
